item.title: Adding totals and subtotals rows with pandas or the tidyverse
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: When dealing with a dataframe, generating aggregate data is a very common task. In my experience, presenting the summary statistics for the whole population or for subgroups directly in the dataframe can be useful, if not necessary. Today, I present my recipe to achieve this with the pandas and tidyverse packages.
